movies.title: Adult Camp
movies.plot: Adult Camp is a comedy about the bumpy road to personal growth. A group of men and women, strangers to each other, choose to spend a different kind of summer holiday week by traveling to the beautiful Turku archipelago to participate in an inviting, upgraded version of an adult camp. When they discover that the galloping horses from the camp's sales video are just symbols of a free mind, and the guru of the camp takes off to witness his dog in labour, the participants are forced to examine themselves and each other to find the necessary elements for growth. Perhaps the camp doesn't fulfill its promise of the "most wonderful week of your life", but one thing's for sure - no one returns home the same.

biography.bio: Minttu Mustakallio was born on July 23, 1973 in Ylivieska, Finland. She is an actress, known for Producing Adults (2004), The Storage (2011) and Adult Camp (2015).
biography.name: Minttu Mustakallio

biography.bio: Taneli Mäkelä was born on March 10, 1959 in Espoo, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for Guerre d'hiver (1989), Team Ahma (1998) and Ihmisten puolue (2008). He has been married to Anna-Maija Pentti since 1989. They have two children.
biography.name: Taneli Mäkelä

biography.bio: Eppu Salminen was born on December 10, 1965 in Lahti, Finland as Jarmo Juhani Salminen. He is an actor and writer, known for Adult Camp (2015), The Kiss of Evil (2011) and Garter Snake (2011). He has been married to Kaisa Kuikkaniemi since May 17, 2014. They have two children. He was previously married to Riitta Havukainen and Minna Turunen.
biography.name: Eppu Salminen

biography.bio: Iina Kuustonen was born in 1984. She is an actress and writer, known for Summertime (2014), Sanaton sopimus (2007) and Adult Camp (2015).
biography.name: Iina Kuustonen

biography.bio: Minna Koskela was born on June 3, 1967 in Janakkala, Finland. She is an actress and writer, known for Kumman kaa (2003), Little Nurse (1999) and Upswing (2003).
biography.name: Minna Koskela

biography.bio: Essi Hellén is an actress and writer, known for 21 Ways to Ruin a Marriage (2013), Mersusta seuraava (2015) and Adult Camp (2015).
biography.name: Essi Hellén

biography.bio: Jarkko Pajunen was born on September 16, 1970 in Varkaus, Finland as Jarkko Matti Pajunen. He is an actor and writer, known for Orkesteri: The Everlast (2015), Vaimonsa mies (2001) and Upswing (2003). He has been married to Irina Pulkka since 2002. They have two children.
biography.name: Jarkko Pajunen

biography.bio: Jarkko Niemi was born in 1984. He is an actor, known for Young Gods (2003), Fruit défendu (2009) and Kamome Diner (2006).
biography.name: Jarkko Niemi

biography.bio: Lauri Tanskanen is an actor, known for Stars Above (2012), La Reine garçon (2015) and Adult Camp (2015).
biography.name: Lauri Tanskanen

biography.bio: Annaleena Sipilä was born on February 20, 1967 in Pyhäjärvi Ol, Finland. She is an actress, known for Little Nurse (1999), Mittari (2005) and Blue Corner (2002). She is married to Johannes Lahtela.
biography.name: Annaleena Sipilä

biography.bio: Leoline Ragnar Rohkea IV is an actor, known for Adult Camp (2015).
biography.name: Leoline Ragnar Rohkea IV

biography.bio: Mika Kujala was born on March 22, 1960 in Forssa, Finland as Mika Jussi Kujala. He is an actor, known for Adult Camp (2015), Love and Other Troubles (2012) and Vares - The Sheriff (2015). He has been married to Riitta Salminen since 1990. They have two children.
biography.name: Mika Kujala

biography.bio: Maria Hannonen is an actress, known for Adult Camp (2015) and Matu! (2010).
biography.name: Maria Hannonen

biography.bio: Dodo Oltrecolli is an actor, known for Pinocchio (2002), La Reine garçon (2015) and Adult Camp (2015).
biography.name: Dodo Oltrecolli

biography.bio: Jouko Nivalinna is an actor, known for Adult Camp (2015), Vares: The Path of the Righteous Men (2012) and Juha (2015).
biography.name: Jouko Nivalinna
